instruction: Generate an alternate ending for the given story
input: The little girl was so excited to have a friend that she had never had before. She shared her secrets and her fears with her new found friend who understood her like no one else.
output: The girl and her newfound friend became inseparable and went everywhere and did everything together. Years later, they both went off to college, but they kept in touch by letters sent over long distances, always comforting one another and providing encouragement when needed. Eventually, they both got into fulfilling careers, but they never lost touch and remained the best of friends for life.
